name: SafetyKat
slogan: A crowd driven emergency and logistics management platform
description:
In a nutshell, SafetyKat is a centralised crowd driven platform underpinned by Artificial Intelligence. It provides a mechanism to track disasters, keep loved ones informed, avoid abuse and fake news, and provide a reliable solution that emergency services and businesses can subscribe to.

This will result in savings to time, effort, money, resources and ultimately, lives. SafetyKat also brings the added benefit to our business subscribers of protecting sales revenues by increasing crowd confidence in safety.

team.name: David Buch
team.bioHtml: Founder @Deeplogi.ca, @SafetyKat

jobs.title: Co-founder Business development
jobs.description:
We are looking for a co-founder/business development lead with excellent  experience in the B2B sector to join Safetykat to help build and generate new client relationships and sign up big business. The position is open for both part-time and full-time commitment.

You will be joining a small startup at a crucial time, to help launch and build a product that has the interest of an extremely famous and high net worth individual. We need to build traction for the product to open a pathway to globalisation.

If you are open to the challenge and prepared to take the risk, this could be the next big thing.

Initially there is no salary, but guaranteed equity. Once you sign up the first deal.. Salary will follow.
